page.title: 08INSIDE BARFORD SCHOOL
page.content: In our school we have two big classrooms where we work most of the time. They have a high roof which looks like a triangle with lots of beams. In the Junior classroom we have a Maths. cupboard and a big cupboard for books and paper.In one corner of the room is a book corner, we have a lot of books. We have two goldfish. We have a television, a computer and a piano. We use the room for assembly and to eat our lunch. In the Infant room we have a book corner, play area with dressing up clothes and lots of constructional toys. We have a big activity room for painting and making things. We have an entrance hall with a music table where we can play percussion instruments. Some of us play the recorder. We have three small cloakrooms for our coats. We have an office.
